title: REDCap Metadata Utilities — rcm
text: Attach metadata REDCap data.frame extract information database informed manner. S3 Class attaches rows REDCap data dictionary columns data .

title: REDCap Metadata Utilities — rcm
code: rcm(df_data, df_metadata, df_form_event_map = NULL)

title: REDCap Metadata Utilities — rcm
text: df_data Dataframe comprising downloaded REDCap data. Download REDCap CSV format raw values Data Export Tool export records API method. df_metadata Dataframe comprising REDCap metadata downloaded Data Dictionary page metadata API method. df_form_event_map Optional. Dataframe comprising REDCap instrument-event mappings downloaded Project Settings page formEventMapping API method.
